name: Organ Baggin'
description:
Aim of the game: 

Kidnap villagers who are around the town by creeping and sneaking up to them and snatching them with your sack. Once they are bagged take them back to the bakery where their organs will be harvested and baked into meat pies. These will then be sold back to the unsuspecting villagers which will go towards your score.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Kidnap - SPACE

Sneak - CTRL

Run - Shift

Credits:

Louis Hughes - Programmer https://www.badimpstudios.co.uk/  -  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGVolU5qlzbpoP51G0naz_A
